name: Teleparkour
description:
Hello! There are 3 rules in the game: 1)Don't touch red obstacles 2) Don't fall down in the deep 3) Don't run out of distance and teleports

So, the idea of this game is to set the range of teleportation, and to limit the teleportations count, and to limit the distance the player can walk. Also if you teleport or jump with landing on the other platform, you don't lose distance. To teleport you need to press left mouse button, and your target must be in 50 meters from you;

The teleportation is not the only mechanic in this game. There are also grappling hook and moveable objects.

Have Fun!
